channel.title: black pepper on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in black pepper on Recipes

item.title: beef a la parisienne
item.description: 1 1/2 pounds steak meat (beefsteak) 2 cloves of garlic 1 teaspoon salt 3/4 teaspoon pepper black powder 1 teaspoon lemon juice 1 teaspoon cider vinegar 1/2 teaspoon powders chili 1 teaspoon split oregano leaves 2 8-ounce cans of tomato sauce Cut the meat into 4 servings. Mash the garlic and mix with the salt and pepper. Adobe the meat with this everywhere. Combine lemon juice and vinegar, chili powders and oregano.

item.title: Salvadorean rice and chicken
item.description: 2 cups rice coarse salt 5 cups of hot water 1 bay leaf 1 lemon husk lemon juice 6 poultry livers lard 1-2 onion in fine julienne 1 glass of marsala wine 1 pinch of salt 1 pinch of black pepper 1 pinch of cinnamon 2 teaspoons rice starch 1 cup warm milk Put in a clay pot the rice with the salt, water, bay leaf, a piece of lemon peel and a little lemon juice.
